CustomField.description: Used to exclude people who are not eligible for entry. Values are: NINT – a new applicant, no assessment has been made NO – haven’t met entry requirements, prerequisites, excluded/failed, failed teaching suitability or portfolio, below the definitely out threshold, or has been offered a higher preference PEN – under assessment or has been assessed but is in between the definitely in and definitely out thresholds NOCH – no CHESSN (Commonwealth Higher Education Student Support Number) – always include these people as this is usually resolved quickly YES – have been assessed and met all requirements, including definitely in threshold. Will receive an offer at next offer round.
CustomField.label: Course Allocability Status
